sentence.text: The tumor cells resembled pro-B cells, and were CD19+IgM-IgD-CD93+CD43+CD21-CD23-VpreB+CXCR4+ Consistent with the pro-B-cell stage of B-cell development, microarray analysis revealed enrichment of transcripts, including V(D)J recombination, Rag2, CD93, Vpreb1, Vpreb3, and Igll1 We confirmed RAG1 expression in Tg26 tumors, and hypothesized that HIV-1 matrix protein p17 may directly induce RAG1 in B cells.
